column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////First of all
column2: I love desserts. Underneath my magic shell chocolate exterior
column3: forged from years of scarfing down rocky road ice cream and sprinkles
column4: is still the young me of 4th grade: husky
column6: and living off of egg tarts. I can't even look at desserts without giggling
column7: therefore these will be judged on a giggle scale.
